system.description:
Effect: The user auto-succeeds on a Grapple Maneuver check against the target if Clamp hits. The Target becomes Bound 5. While the target is Bound, they take a Tick of HP damage at the end of each of their activations.

If either the Grappled or Bound condition ends, the target loses the other condition.

actions.name: Clamp
actions.description:
Effect: The user auto-succeeds on a Grapple Maneuver check against the target if Clamp hits. The Target becomes Bound 5. While the target is Bound, they take a Tick of HP damage at the end of each of their activations.

If either the Grappled or Bound condition ends, the target loses the other condition.
